wikipedia_page.main: Pete Roe (born 20 July 1981) is an English folk singer-songwriter based in London, England. He was formerly a member of Laura Marling's band and has also toured with Mumford and Sons, Lucy Rose, Nathaniel Rateliff, Willy Mason and Ben Howard, He has been compared to Bert Jansch, and been described by NME as the missing link between John Martyn and Leonard Cohen.
